CustomField.description:
Formula used for reporting to categorize Moment type.
In System Use: 'Moment: After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.formula: CASE( Moment_Type__c , "Demo Request", "Demo Request", "Content Download", "Content", "Form Submission", "Content", "Live Event - Retool Hosted", "Marketing Event", "Live Event - Tradeshow", "Marketing Event", "Live Event - Hackathon", "Marketing Event", "Live Event - Other", "Marketing Event", "Product Signup", "Product", "Webinar - Live", "Marketing Event", "Webinar - Recorded", "Marketing Event", "Partner Referral","Partner Referral", "Other")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula used for reporting to categorize Moment type.
CustomField.label: Moment Type (Reporting)
